column4: My brothers laptop is a Dell Inspiron 1545, and it seems that the wireless is messed up. He can connect on ethernet, and the internet works. But when he connects with wireless, it connects, but theres no internet...how can I fix this?
No, its a broadcom wireless driver. It works on some wireless modems, but ours, it won't work.
you have a broadcom modem?
no, my brother has a broadcom driver for his wireless, I do also, but mine works, his doesn't.
same wireless modem?
yup
are you sure that the drivers are installed properly? did it work before?

when I installed Ubuntu on my laptop, it did it automatically being connected to ethernet, I did the same thing to his, and it shows wireless networks and everything, its just when you connect to the wireless the internet won't work.
We went on vacation and just got back yesterday, and he connected to some guys wireless and it worked.
hmm then i can only think of a configuration problem.. did you install any updates?
yeah I installed updates on both.
I think I did anyway. let me check.
ok.. check if both have the same kernel versions
Forgot to update his. I'll be back later if it doesn't work.
wait
yes?
so yours works right? or was that his? the wireless, i mean
Mine works. I have a Lenovo G550, he has a Dell Inspiron 1545, but same wireless card. His won't work, but mine does.
ah ok.. good luck then :)
thanks
